title: Fox Launches the All-New 36 & 36 SL
content:
Since its debut in 2005, the FOX 36 has set the benchmark for single-crown forks, delivering best-in-class performance with an unmatched stiffness-to-weight ratio. In its latest evolution, the 36 raises the bar even further for All-Mountain dominance, while the all-new 36 SL brings lightweight performance to aggressive Trail riders. With a redesigned chassis, increased bushing overlap, and the innovative new compliant FLOAT Glidecore air springs, both forks push the limits of stiffness, smoothness, and responsiveness in their respective categories…

Fox 36: The Apex of All-Mountain

With the new 36, we set out to elevate the performance of these boundary-pushing bikes, delivering a fork that not only meets but exceeds the demands of modern riders. The new 36 combines the confidence-inspiring Enduro feel of the 38 with a category-optimized design that’s lightweight, responsive, and playful.

Key Innovations:

  • New 36 Chassis – 20% greater torsional stiffness over the previous model, approaching the steering precision of the FOX 38.
  • Arch Optimization – Generatively designed, the new 36 arch enhances torsional stiffness while strategic cutouts minimize weight and refine aesthetics.
  • FLOAT Glidecore Ultra-Low-Friction Compliant Air Spring – A completely new design with a floating air spring core that decouples the stanchion from the air shaft to maintain smooth travel even under bending loads from speed or rider weight. This gives riders a supple and planted feeling when they need it most.
  • Increased Bushing Overlap – 30mm of additional bushing overlap significantly reduces friction, providing a smoother feel, especially on rough terrain.
  • Inboard Bypass Channels – Relocated from the aft side to the inboard side, these channels enhance small bump sensitivity, reduce pressure buildup, and improve overall suspension response.
  • Low-Profile Bleeders – Redesigned with a grooved structure for easier pressure equalization.
  • Air Spring Top Cap – Now compatible with a standard Shimano cassette tool for simple volume adjustments.
  • Refined Mudguard Mounting – Mounted to the arch and seal flanges instead of bleeder ports for improved durability and aesthetics.

Fox 36 Tech Specs:

  • Wheel Size: 29, 27.5
  • Travel: 140mm, 150mm, 160mm
  • Rake: 37mm, 44mm (27.5”); 44mm (29”)
  • Rotor Size: Direct Mount 200, up to 230
  • Air Spring: FLOAT EVOL Compliant
  • Starting Weight: 1920g (29” 160mm GRIP X)
  • 36 MSRP– $749-$1199 USD / $999-$1599 CAD / €999 – €1609 EUR / 1299-2099 AUS

Fox 36 SL: Short Travel. Hard Hitting. All Trail.

For riders who demand a stiff, responsive fork without unnecessary weight, the 36 SL brings big-fork confidence to modern Trail bikes. At just 1755g (29” 140mm GRIP X), the 36 SL offers 20% greater torsional stiffness than the 34 while expanding your trail bike’s capabilities.

Key Innovations:

  • Arch Above the Rest – Generatively optimized crown and arch provide 20% more torsional stiffness over the previous Trail-class fork, the 34.
  • FLOAT Glidecore Compliant Air Spring – The Glidecore air spring decouples the stanchion from the air shaft to maintain smooth travel even under bending loads from speed or rider weight.
  • Extended Bushing Overlap – 20mm additional bushing overlap over the 34 ensures reduced friction and improved suspension feel.
  • GRIP X Damper – Combines excellent descending performance with an easy-access firm mode for pedaling efficiency.
  • Inboard Bypass Channels – Strategically relocated to reduce friction and optimize suspension feel.
  • Low-Profile Bleeders – Redesigned with a grooved structure for easier pressure equalization.
  • Air Spring Top Cap – Now compatible with a standard Shimano cassette tool for simple volume adjustments.
  • Refined Mudguard Mounting – Mounted to the arch and seal flanges instead of bleeder ports for improved durability and aesthetics.

Fox 36 SL Tech Specs:

  • Wheel Size: 29
  • Travel: 120mm, 130mm, 140mm
  • Rake: 44mm offset
  • Axle: Kabolt SL
  • Rotor Size: Direct Mount 180, up to 203
  • Air Spring: FLOAT EVOL Compliant
  • Starting Weight: 1755g (29” 140mm GRIP X)
  • MSRP – $699-$1149 USD / $939-$1539 CAD / €939 – €1539 EUR / 1199-1999 AUS
